identity.Description: The managed identity for the DigitalTwinsInstance.

hostName.Description: Api endpoint to work with DigitalTwinsInstance.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: Public network access for the DigitalTwinsInstance.

groupIds.Description: The list of group ids for the private endpoint connection.

status.Description: The status of a private endpoint connection.

description.Description: The description for the current state of a private endpoint connection.

actionsRequired.Description: Actions required for a private endpoint connection.

type.Description: The type of Managed Identity used by the DigitalTwinsInstance. Only SystemAssigned is supported.

principalId.Description: The object id of the Managed Identity Resource. This will be sent to the RP from ARM via the x-ms-identity-principal-id header in the PUT request if the resource has a systemAssigned(implicit) identity

tenantId.Description: The tenant id of the Managed Identity Resource. This will be sent to the RP from ARM via the x-ms-client-tenant-id header in the PUT request if the resource has a systemAssigned(implicit) identity

createdTime.Description: Time when the Endpoint was added to DigitalTwinsInstance.

authenticationType.Description: Specifies the authentication type being used for connecting to the endpoint.

deadLetterSecret.Description: Dead letter storage secret for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

deadLetterUri.Description: Dead letter storage URL for identity-based authentication.

accessKey1.Description: EventGrid secondary accesskey. Will be obfuscated during read.

accessKey2.Description: EventGrid secondary accesskey. Will be obfuscated during read.

endpointType.Description: The type of Digital Twins endpoint

connectionStringPrimaryKey.Description: PrimaryConnectionString of the endpoint for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

connectionStringSecondaryKey.Description: SecondaryConnectionString of the endpoint for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

endpointUri.Description: The URL of the EventHub namespace for identity-based authentication. It must include the protocol sb://

entityPath.Description: The EventHub name in the EventHub namespace for identity-based authentication.

endpointType.Description: The type of Digital Twins endpoint

primaryConnectionString.Description: PrimaryConnectionString of the endpoint for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

secondaryConnectionString.Description: SecondaryConnectionString of the endpoint for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

endpointUri.Description: The URL of the ServiceBus namespace for identity-based authentication. It must include the protocol sb://

entityPath.Description: The ServiceBus Topic name for identity-based authentication

endpointType.Description: The type of Digital Twins endpoint
